name: Cityscape
description:
Welcome to Cityscape, look around the room to find an exit. Reach out and use your hands to check for exits and interact. Keep hands out of FOV while moving with the Xbox 360 controller. Only use hands when not moving.

Requires an Oculus Rift, Leap Motion and an Xbox 360 controller. Works best in Extended mode with Rift as primary and only monitor.
